title: So is or is not Sudden Impact changing RIOT Games?
body: About a month ago I when I posed the question about lethality I was told this was being changed to flat lethality / magic penetration but since then I've seen nothing and with one week to go until these runes go live I'd appreciate knowing what's going on or going to happen?

replies.body: Sudden Impact got changed over to Lethality/MPEN a few weeks ago.
Wait a week and find out.
